author: roachman14
body: Does anyone remember a very similar advertisement to this one that ran in the mid to late 1990s? It was for something called "Digital DNA" by Motorola. It had a shifty looking man walking through a convenience store putting things in his pockets, and then trying to walk right out the front door, where he was stopped by the shopkeeper, who said "you forgot your receipt", and then handed it to him. I think it was some kind of predecessor to RFID payment systems that never materialized
